name: Fluffbook
description:
Entry for SEA Game Jam 2020.  The theme of the jam was Connections, so we decided to make a game where you make a connection with people online.

Game was originally named A Furrendly Encounter, but was ultimately decided to be named Fluffbook instead. The game was developed in under 72 hours by 3 people.

Credits:

  • Daniel Conde - Content Designer
  • Gino Diccion - Programmer
  • Harrison Manalo - Artist

ALL assets (excluding music and SFX) in the game were crafted by the team. 

BGM - Acoustic Folk Instrumental – Hyde - Free Instrumentals (No Copyright Music)
